statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_info;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_name FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM supplier_info ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier X' AND contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_suppliers, contact_name FROM supplier_info GROUP BY contact_name HAVING total_suppliers > 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shipments;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT s.supplier_name, sh.shipment_date FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN shipments sh ON s.supplier_id = sh.supplier_id ORDER BY sh.shipment_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_address, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name, COUNT(sh.shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN shipments sh ON s.supplier_id = sh.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id, s.supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT name, address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT shipment_date, quantity_received FROM Shipments WHERE shipment_id = 1;
SELECT s.name, i.item_name, sh.shipment_date FROM Suppliers s JOIN Inventory i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id JOIN Shipments sh ON i.inventory_id = sh.inventory_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT name, address, phone_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT s.name, i.item_name, i.quantity FROM Suppliers s JOIN Inventory i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id WHERE i.quantity > 0;
SELECT shipment_date, item_name, quantity_received FROM Shipments s JOIN Inventory i ON s.inventory_id = i.inventory_id ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;

SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, i.item_name AS product_name, sh.shipment_date, sh.quantity_received FROM Suppliers s JOIN Inventory i ON s.supplier_id = i.supplier_id JOIN Shipments sh ON i.inventory_id = sh.inventory_id WHERE sh.quantity_received > 10 ORDER BY sh.shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, current_stock FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Tech%'
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, address FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id WHERE products.unit_price < 100
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE current_stock < 50 ORDER BY current_stock ASC
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_role FROM users JOIN roles ON users.user_role = roles.role_name ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, item_name FROM shipments INNER JOIN inventory ON shipments.inventory_id = inventory.inventory_id
SELECT user_name, user_email, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.user_role = roles.role_name
